Certainly there are some pages which misuse CSS styles, making it impossible to reach its content (text, images, etc)

I can disable page styles through menus (View > Page Style > No Style), but this is not persistent.

Page Info dialog should offer a 'Disable page styles' preference on permissions tab so I (user) can turn it permanent

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: fernandopsilveira@yahoo.com.br
